column2:
```r
line <- function(x, b0, b1)
  return(b0 + x * b1)


#default paramethers
b0 = 95
b1 = 1

sample <- sample %>%
  mutate(fit_height = line(weight, b0 = 95, b1 = 1))

sample %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = weight, y = height)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_point(aes(y = fit_height), shape = 1) +
  geom_abline(slope = 1, intercept = 95, col = \red\") +
